(MEETING)
a meeting of government leaders from several countries: The economic summit did not accomplish all that the President had hoped it would.
Add to word list

a very important meeting between government leaders from different countries: EU leaders will debate the draft constitution at a summit in Greece next month.call/convene/hold a summit The executive secretary has called a summit of global leaders to address the problem.attend/organize/host a summit South Africa hosts a summit this weekend aimed at countering the devastating effects of the HIV pandemic.
